event.name: Self Awareness - POD Activity opens
event.description:
Topics for speaking in the POD: 

1) What have been my top 2-3 insights from the session and/or the practices during the week? 

                                                                            OR

 2) When I practice self awareness by observing  'WHAT' I do instead of 'WHY' I do, my insights wereâ€¦

ACTIVITY GUIDELINE:

Each person can take 3 minutes to speak without interruption in the POD. Once all participants have had their time, there can be a free flowing discussion in the POD.

SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS:

When a person is speaking, the other practice mindful listening - not interrupting AND giving the speaker their complete attention.
